annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EN
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union
annotations.translation: 欧盟官方公报

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2230/2004
annotations.translation: 委员会 (EC) 第 2230/2004 号条例

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: of 23 December 2004

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: laying down detailed rules for the implementation of European Parliament and Council Regulation (EC) No 178/2002 with regard to the network of organisations operating in the fields within the European Food Safety Authority's mission
annotations.translation: 实施欧洲议会和理事会 (EC) 第 178/2002 号条例，就在欧洲食品安全局使命范围内开展工作的组织网络制定细则

annotations.label: Caption
annotations.text: (Text with EEA relevance)
annotations.translation: （与 EEA 有关的文本）

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体委员会，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《建立欧洲共同体条约》，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Regulation (EC) No 178/2002 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 28 January 2002 laying down the general principles and requirements of food law, establishing the European Food Safety Authority and laying down procedures in matters of food safety (¹), and in particular Article 36(3) thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到 2002 年 1 月 28 日欧洲议会和理事会 (EC) 第 178/2002 号条例，该条例规定了食品法的一般原则和要求，建立了欧洲食品安全局，并规定了食品安全方面的程序 (¹)，特别是其中第 36(3) 条，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having consulted the European Food Safety Authority,
annotations.translation: 在咨询了欧洲食品安全局之后，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas:
annotations.translation: 鉴于：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) Networking between the European Food Safety Authority (hereinafter referred to as the Authority') and the Member States' organisations operating in the fields within the Authority's mission is one of the basic principles of the Authority's operation. It is therefore necessary to stipulate how this principle should be implemented, in accordance with Article 36(1) and (2) of Regulation (EC) No 178/2002, in order to ensure efficiency.
annotations.translation: (1) 欧洲食品安全局（以下简称“安全局”）与在其使命范围内运作的成员国组织之间的网络联系是安全局运作的基本原则之一。因此，有必要根据 (EC) 第 178/2002 号条例第 36(1) 和 (2) 条，规定如何实施这一原则，以确保效率。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) Certain bodies in the Member States carry out tasks at national level which are similar to those of the Authority. Networking must make it possible to foster a framework for scientific cooperation allowing information and knowledge to be shared, common tasks to be identified, and optimum use to be made of resources and expertise. It is also important to facilitate the compilation of a Community-level summary of the data on food and feed safety collected by these bodies.
annotations.translation: (2) 成员国的某些机构在国家层面执行与安全局类似的任务。网络联系必须要建立一个科学合作框架，使信息和知识得以共享，共同任务得以确定，资源和专业知识得以最佳利用。为这些机构收集的食品和饲料安全数据进行社区层面的汇编提供便利也很重要。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) As these bodies are to be entrusted with certain tasks with a view to assisting the Authority with its general mission as defined by Regulation (EC) No 178/2002, it is essential for them to be designated by the Member States on the basis of criteria covering scientific and technical competence, efficiency and independence.
annotations.translation: (3) 这些机构将承担某些任务，以协助安全局履行 (EC) 第 178/2002 号条例所界定的总体使命，成员国必须依据涵盖科学和技术能力以及效率和独立性的标准指定这些机构。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) Member States need to provide the Authority with evidence of compliance with the necessary criteria for the inclusion of competent bodies on the list drawn up by the Authority's Management Board.
annotations.translation: (4) 成员国需要向安全局提供证据，证明其符合列入安全局管理委员会制定的名单的必要标准。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) Member States must also stipulate the specific areas of competence of the competent bodies designated, so as to facilitate the operation of the network. Thus, in accordance with European Parliament and Council Regulation (EC) No 1829/2003 (²), when preparing an opinion on a request for authorisation of a genetically modified food or feed, the Authority may ask a Member State's competent body for assessing foods and feeds to carry out a safety assessment of the relevant food or feed in accordance with Article 36 of Regulation (EC) No 178/2002.
annotations.translation: (5) 成员国还必须规定指定主管机构的具体职权范围，以便利网络的运作。因此，根据欧洲议会和理事会 (EC) 第 1829/2003 号条例 (²)，在就转基因食品或饲料的许可申请准备意见时，安全局可以要求成员国的食品和饲料评估主管机构根据 (EC) 第 178/2002 号条例第 36 条对相关食品或饲料进行安全评估。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (6) In accordance with the provisions of Article 27(4)(c) of Regulation (EC) No 178/2002, it is important for the Advisory Forum to be able to ensure close cooperation with the Authority and the competent bodies of the Member States by promoting the European networking of organisations operating within the fields of the Authority's mission.
annotations.translation: (6) 根据 (EC) 第 178/2002 号条例第 27(4)(c) 条的规定，咨询论坛必须能够促进在安全局使命范围开展活动的组织建立欧洲网络联系，确保与管理局和成员国主管机构的密切合作。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (7) The tasks entrusted to the competent bodies on the list must involve providing the Authority with assistance with its mission to provide scientific and technical support in relation to Community policy and legislation, without prejudice to the Authority's responsibility for performing its tasks pursuant to Regulation (EC) No 178/2002.
annotations.translation: (7) 清单上赋予各主管机构的任务必须涉及向安全局提供协助，即协助其履行在共同体政策和立法方面提供科学和技术支持的使命，但不妨碍安全局根据 (EC) 第 178/2002 号条例履行其任务职责。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (8) Financial support must be granted on the basis of criteria which ensure that such support contributes efficiently and effectively to the performance of the Authority's tasks and to the Community priorities as regards scientific and technical support in the fields concerned.
annotations.translation: (8) 提供财政支持必须依据有关标准，以确保这种支持能切实有效地促进安全局履行其任务，以及共同体在有关领域的科技支持优先事项。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (9) It is important to ensure on a general basis that the tasks entrusted by the Authority to the network's member organisations are performed to high scientific and technical standards, efficiently (also with regard to deadlines) and independently. However, the Authority must remain responsible for allocating tasks to the competent bodies and for monitoring performance.
annotations.translation: (9) 必须在一般基础上确保安全局委托给网络成员组织的任务能够以高科技标准高效（也涉及截止日期）、独立地执行。然而，安全局必须继续负责向主管机构分配任务和监测执行情况。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (10) The measures provided for in this Regulation are in accordance with the opinion of the Standing Committee on the Food Chain and Animal Health,
annotations.translation: (10) 本条例规定的措施符合食物链和动物健康常设委员会的意见，

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (¹) OJ L 31, 1.2.2002, p. 1. Regulation amended by Regulation (EC) No 1642/2003 (OJ L 245, 29.9.2003, p. 4).
annotations.translation: (¹) OJ L 31，2002 年 2 月 1 日，第 1 页。经 (EC) 第 1642/2003 号条例（OJ L 245，2003 年 9 月 29 日，第 4 页）修正的条例。
